      • fillTable

        public static int[] fillTable(int[] table,
                              int offset,
                              int length,
                              int color0,
                              int color1)
        Fills the colors table.
        Parameters:
        table - the colors table to fill.
        offset - the offset.
        length - the length.
        color0 - the first color.
        color1 - the last color.
        Returns:
        the colors table.

      • fillTable

        public static int[] fillTable(int[] table,
                              int offset,
                              int length,
                              int color0,
                              int color1,
                              double[] AV,
                              double[] RV,
                              double[] GV,
                              double[] BV)
        Fills the colors table.
        Parameters:
        table - the colors table to fill.
        offset - the offset.
        length - the length.
        color0 - the first color.
        color1 - the last color.
        AV - the alpha component modulation (same size as length parameter).
        RV - the red component modulation (same size as length parameter).
        GV - the green component modulation (same size as length parameter).
        BV - the blue component modulation (same size as length parameter).
        Returns:
        the colors table.
